name: Fangs of Sacrifice
description:
This is my entry into the Spooktober Game Jam 2021 with the theme of Sacrifice!

Fangs of Sacrifice is a clicker game that I have built to work mainly on mobile platforms. While it is very simple, the project allowed me to work on some of my C# skills and create a fun little clicker in the vain of Cookie Clicker but with a spooky twist.

You must keep clicking to keep gaining followers and sacrificing those followers to gain even more followers. See how many followers you can get for your Vampire cult!

Check out my portfolio at www.broccolibay.co.uk

Hope this little game can get you in the spooky season mood!
